resources.string: This Activity describes all the songs.The songs in your own library will also be displayed in this activity.This activity contains the Playlists,Albums. We can go to Payments Activity by clicking on the respective button.

We can add a Pay with Paytm button to an our Android App by using Paytm Mobile Payment Libraries(i.e MPL). It will enable one touch and secure payment infrastructure to your app.After payment control it will be back to the app.
This Activity describes the song currently playing.We can go to our library of songs, the Playlists and the Payments Activity.
This Activity describes all the playlists which are their in the Library or one can add it too.
